suppress.notes: 2022-09: Not applicable to us. We don't use HTTP Invoker nor do we communicate through native java bean serialization. We use JSON instead. Suppressed for a year to allow re-assessing in the unlikely event we decide to introduce it.

2022-09: Not applicable to us. This vulnerability requires both spring-cloud-netflix-hystrix-dashboard and spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf. We have neither in our codebase or dependencies, so the vulnerability doesn't apply to us. Suppressed for a year to allow re-assessing in the unlikely event we decide to introduce those dependencies.
these common libraries are being mistaken as Apache Commons Net
these common libraries are being mistaken as Apache Commons Net
